inn1.comm: very loose from Tharanga, pushes at a good length ball angled across him, hint of straightening and a thick inside edge scoots to fine leg
some movement early on, this is angled in outside off, good length, moves away a touch, Mahela leaves
holds its line, and bounces from a good length outside off, Mahela jabs at it, taking a hand off the bat
no problems with blocking this pitched up ball on off
a caress between cover and point, a step forward to an overpitched ball that straightens and a flowing push earn Mahela a couple
nice, this holds its line and takes off close to off stump, Mahela shoulders arms
Umesh starts with the wrong line a foot outside leg stump and some swing takes it further down
comes slowly from just short of a length, Tharanga nudges it to square leg
nice line, close to off, slight inward angle, and moves away, Mahela watches it and lets it go
overpitched, Mahela tries to whip it through midwicket but checks the stroke in the end, would suggest it is not quite coming on
excellent area again from Umesh, lots of bounce as well, just back of a driving length, and some away shape, left alone
width for the drive, but Mahela cannot time it, rolls to extra cover
just outside off stump, good length, holding the line, blocked off the front foot
run out chance missed by Rohit at square leg, Tharanga closed the face on this length ball and took off, had no chance of making it, but the throw just missed on the bounce
some swing but down the pads, he nudges it fine but DK stops it on the bounce
Rohit dives in slow elegance, but the ball is scooting away from him in front of square leg off a Tharanga clip
on off stump now, he pushes softly in front of extra cover
Tharanga is not finding the middle of the bat often, again he thick inside edges to the leg side as he looks to push through the covers
lift from short of a length with the angle, left alone
there for the pull, shortish outside off, but Mahela's found little timing on the stroke, and it has gone to midwicket
comes in with the angle to middle and off, Mahela leans outside the line and nudges it square
holds the line from a full length, and hits the pads, but pitched outside leg and was headed further down
back of a length on the stumps, he goes up on his toes and brings it down
more bounce from short of a length, slight width this time, chopped to point, it is really not coming on

Tharanga shows off his strength behind point, glides this wide delivery with superb timing, Ishant does not have much ground to make from third man, but the ball is travelling, he slides too, but cannot stop it, could have done better
Mahela decides it is time to create some momentum of his own, skips out and goes over extra cover, hasn't timed it too well but enough for a couple
aborted appeal for lbw, for Mahela has hit this pitched up ball right off the inside edge into his pad, that was taking out leg stump otherwise
rises from just short of driving length, Mahela moves across, opens the face and runs it to third man
right on off stump from a good length, defended to the covers
hasn't gone after this full delivery and has checked the drive to extra cover
tight single, very tight, pushed in front of mid off, Dhawan runs forward, dives forward and lobs it towards the non-striker's, but misses, tharanga would have just made it
whether it comes on or not, Tharanga loves it square of the wicket on off, gets some width and glides it past cover, exquisite
more timing from Tharanga, steers through point this time, third man is quite square
low full toss pushed to mid on

didn't look he'd time this one, a length ball that seemed to stop on him just outside off, Mahela decided to go over mid on, he had to reach out and ended up hitting it so well, it's bounced just inside the rope
flows forward into a dead-bat defence now outside off, looking better and better
away swinger wide outside off, he tries to reach it but is beaten
Tharanga looking much more comfortable now, comes forward and blocks to extra cover
bounces slowly down leg from short of a length, Tharanga helps it behind square
swipes this length ball through midwicket, off the inner part of the bat, but in the gap
digs it in short at 135 kph, right on the stumps, Mahela pulls out of the line
widish length ball steered down to third man
moves in from wide of the crease but starts too far outside off to entice Tharanga
this has gone almost all the way, goes after a wide and full outswinger, ends up slicing it to the fine third man boundary
goes very full on the pads, Mahela misses, ball rolls square
hit high on the pad with a skiddy short of a length ball, 141.5 kph, flies to wide slip
pacy pitched up delivery just outside off at 143.5 kph, pushed to extra cover
bouncing on off stump now, kept down in front of short cover
Tharanga gets enough on the pull this time, controls it well too, it was climbing outside off, finds the gap at midwicket and it turns out to be a futile chase for mid on
pounds it halfway on the pitch and it sails over the batsman's head. Mahela did try to guide it over the slip fielder, but didn't make any contact
another shortish delivery around off stump, Mahela calmly gets on top of that and steers it to third man
he bowls a length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends to cover off the front foot
angled in and on a length, the batsman whips it to the leg side, but straight to midwicket
now a short delivery, but the batsman ducks well in time.
bowls on a good length just outside off, Tharanga comes forward and defends to cover
he bowls it fuller on off stump, Tharanga comes forward and pushes it between the two cover fielders for a single

he draws an outside edge off the first ball! But Tharanga didn't go fully forward to this length delivery, and his bottom hand came off the bat as he tried to push it forward. Luckily for him, it went past the left of the lone slip fielder. Good sliding effort by Dhawan at third man saves a certain boundary
length delivery angling across the left-hander, Tharanga leaves it alone
he keeps it tight just outside off stump, the batsman again lets it go through
he bowls this one on back of length around off, the batsman defends it to off
beautifully punched through point off the back foot, though there wasn't much room, the ball for short enough
the bowler gives him a gift on the pads and Mahela says thanks, flicks it in the air through square leg
bangs it in short, it comes off slowly, Tharanga is able to drag a pull past mid on
overpitched now, Tharanga pushes with lovely timing, Raina dives at extra cover to his left, and is in some pain with the effort
good length outside off stump, he cannot time it , point fields
good length on middle and leg now, Tharanga turns it to square leg
eases an overpitched ball with an open face wide of point
right through extra cover's hands, Jadeja it is, mid off tidies up, the ovepitched ball was timed well by Mahela
a wristy steer to a short of a length ball takes it to third man
almost played on, was caught on the crease to a length ball that bounced just outside off, jabbed at it with an angled bat, escaped
beats the drive, wasn't quite driving length, climbed a lot too, Tharanga did not help by not moving forward too much
takes the single with a push wide of cover
there is a gully in place for the uppish steer, but Mahela plays it uppishly and sends it to the right of the man
moves across and jabs it towards point
straightens down the leg side and hits the pad
defended off the front foot
moves inside the line and lofts with the spin over extra cover
tossed up on off, blocked back
dropped, it is Vijay who puts down a head-high chance at short third man, Mahela cracked a reverse sweep off the middle of the bat but also straight to the fielder, and straight out
spins in outside off, hit in front of square from the crease
allows a length ball to come on around off and nudges it to square leg
tight line just outside off stump, defended with half a step out
can't find room on this back of a length ball and punches awkwardly to mid off
straightish line from Ishant, Tharanga gets the single to square leg
Ishant bowls it outside off, Mahela steers, gully fields
good line, coming in towards off, short of driving length, Mahela cannot beat the gully fielder
fullish outside off, he runs it to short third man off the front foot

this spun in and hurried on, but Tharanga went back and cut it to the right of short third man, Ishant is not the best man to have in that position, it beats his dive, but would have tested better fielders too
pushed off the front foot, cover runs in and prevents the single
tries to paddle this from outside off, misses and is hit a couple of feet outside off, Jadeja the eternal optimist shouts nevertheless
sweeps forcefully, the top edge swirls high and lands safely way in front of fine leg

shot of the morning, Mahela on the walk, picks the length ball from way outside off and launches it over wide long on, outstanding timing, need so much belief in yourself to play this on a sluggish pitch, and then to time it like this ...
opens the face and runs a length ball to short third

Mahela's got away with this one, hooked this chest-high short ball, Umesh at fine leg had the decision to make, he went half-heartedly forward for the catch, it fell a couple of feet in front, hit his hands and went into the boundary
turned to midwicket
he's not in complete control of this length ball on off, but turns it in the gap past midwicket, in the air
chops a short of a length ball into the pitch
pushed down to long on for a single
gets forward, opens the face to account for the slight turn and defends to covers

Mahela playing another of those eye-catching difficult-wicket innings, goes down on the knee for the reverse sweep and smacks it hard in the air towards third man, the way he hit it, looked like going all the way initially
pushed through outside off, Mahela drops it onto the pitch as he tries to steer
makes some room but this is darted in and he pushes to covers
another one fired in, towards the pad this time, worked to midwicket
Ishant starts on off stump on good length, Tharanga turns it to midwicket for one
wide one from Ishant, Mahela cuts behind point, third man gets to it but his throw is too high to the keeper and gives Mahela time to make it safely for the second
shuffles across to off and works to square leg
front foot leans across, bat comes down in front and a length ball is clipped off the stumps to midwicket
spots some width and goes for the cut, chops it down to third man
slants it good length across Tharanga, who leaves
steps out inside the line and lofts over extra cover to the sweeper
full and quick, pushed past extra cover
pushed to extra cover
pushed through and hurries on towards middle, defended
comes forward to one that is flighted a bit, pushes it to long off
goes across to off and works to square leg, Rohit runs in and keeps them to one
tossed up towards leg stump, defended
nice, tossed up slowly, Tharanga comes forward a touch late and defends awkwardly
pushed through down the pads, Tharanga misses the nudge
enticed him to hit in the air with the flight, Tharanga cleared midwicket's leap though
curls in to leg stump, full length, nudged to short fine
lots of flight, tharanga uncertainly reaches out and pushes, past Ashwin's dive to long on
bounces outside off, he cuts straight to cover
leans forward and across and works from around off to square leg
full length, he pushes it off the inner part of the bat to the bowler
gets to his fifty with a controlled loft over covers, way short of the sweeper
pushed through flat and on off, turned to midwicket
very quick outside off at 102 kph, Tharanga uses the pace and times the cut past short third man
eases down the pitch and slams it to long off
tossed up and drifts into the pad, pushed to long on
quick and straightening on the pad, worked behind square
pushed through good length down the leg side
reaches forward to a 82.6 kph length ball and defends
turn and some bounce now around off, Tharanga leans forward to defend
lunges out and pushes past extra cover, long off keeps them to one
turned off the pad to fine leg
he goes third time for a reverse sweep, gets it to fine short third man
makes some room off the back foot and hits it past extra cover
makes some room and cuts off middle stump through point
pushed through on off, 89.3 kph, defended
this bounced from a good length as it spun in toward the pad, and Tharanga wasn't able to connect with the nudge
tossed up on middle and leg, Mahela cracks a sweep down to fine leg
goes back and cuts a bouncing length ball to the sweeper
quicker and flatter, on the pad, swatted behind square
carries in from round the stumps, Tharanga works it square and raises his bat for another ODI fifty, on comeback
gets forward to a full one around off and works to midwicket
stops and delivers a low full toss on the pads, Mahela does not attack it, hits it along the ground to wide long on
widish good length ball steered straight to point
charges out and swipes a length ball to midwicket
class, this was almost on off stump, back of a length, but Mahela has timed the twirl of the wrists so well, it has beaten third man's dive
pulled in the air down to deep square leg
short and climbing just outside off at 142.2 kph, Tharanga runs it to third man
uses the incoming angle on this short of a length ball to work behind square
finally cannot get hold of a reverse sweep, the full delivery on off rolls away fine past the keeper
pushed back to the bowler
nudges a length ball off pad to square leg
comes down the track, Ashwin shortens in, Mahela swings it in front of square leg
bounces on middle, is turned softly behind square leg
drags the length ball a bit as tharanga comes out now, pushes it wider too, but he is able to ease it to the sweeper
floated wide and full across, driven to deep point
a full toss outside off, but Mahela hits the reverse paddle to point
swats a length ball on off to wide long on
beats him with a leg cutter angled across as tharanga reaches for it
slow and full, pushed back, Kohli stops it with a lunge to his right
hit down to long off, not a bad first over
straightens on middle, turned to midwicket
comes down the track and drives in the air past extra cover to long off
comes down and works past midwicket
some bounce on middle and leg, turned with the spin to square leg
charges out for the big one down the ground but ends up yorking himself, fortunately for him, gets something on it and it goes wide of the keeper
glides a loopy, full and wide ball to backward point who dives to stop it
tries to drive inside out but this is too full on the stumps, and the bat turns in his hands
he's taken this full toss from outside off and swung it in the air behind square leg
mistimes a swipe forward of square leg, Tharanga has to race back, throw is wide and the fielder earns a glare from Kohli
another full toss, he's hit it to extra cover
sharp start from Umesh on his return, bounces this from a good length and gets it to move away slightly, Tharanga prods away from the body and is beaten
poor this time, too full and too wide, Tharanga crashes it through the covers, no chance for the sweeper
beaten again, has a drive at a pitched up ball, it moves away slightly after pitching
short of a length, cramping him for room, he knocks it back
digs out a very full one outside off in front of mid off
hurled full into the pads, away fine past the keeper
drags it flat and short of a length, Tharanga goes back and across and pulls it over midwicket,
pushes forward, Raina sprints to his right and dives to stop the ball
flighted full, Tharanga goes after it, mishits through midwicket
moves forward and drive with the push to long on
Tharanga earns another single with a push to long off
the pace is there, the length is shortish, but the line is down the pads, and an easy single to square leg is on
shot, steps out, makes some room and carves an inswinging length ball over cover

there is a noise here as Mahela looks to pull a short one headed down the leg side, they appeal for caught behind but umpire Gould remains unmoved, does not call it a wide as well, replays show it brushed the shirt around the waist, not sure if it brushed the glove as well just before that
widish length ball cut to third man
backs away a tad to a pitched up ball, but is in no position to play an attacking shot, it arrives quickly and he pats it back

there is a direct hit at the non-striker's end from short third man, some excitement for the Indians, Mahela was not expecting the throw at his end, did not drag the bat in, but his left foot was in by the time the ball hit
pushed through and hits the pad outside leg
goes back and punches, Jadeja runs across and dives from cover
spins in down the leg side as Mahela misses the sweep
bounces extra but he controls the pull to fine leg
moves across and helps it wristily behind square leg
slight turn in on middle, turned to short fine leg, Ishant runs forward and prevents the single, refreshing
full and quick, eased down to long off
tossed up on off stump, pushed to long off
worked off the pad with the turn behind square leg
whoa, sharp turn and bounce outside off beats Mahela this time, DK appeals for the stumping, Mahela's back foot was in the air as he reached forward but he's brought it back in, just in time
reaches forward and pushes to extra cover
fuller and quicker at 94.3 kph, pushed to long off
sweeps a tossed up ball off the pads, short fine leg's dive saves some runs, Raina it is, Kohli claps
moves across and tries to work off leg stump, misses, and takes it on the pad, was going down with the angle and the bowler's appeal is turned down
takes this 91 kph delivery fired in to leg stump, and lifts it over vacant deep backward square leg
so Tharanga goes long on this time, lofts a tossed up ball just wide of the man at mid on
cuts a length ball past point, not getting the second
a pause and a slowly tossed up ball, 76.7 kph, worked through square leg
starts with a short slower one into the body, Mahela swivels, and controls it down to fine leg
he is cramped for room, but his slash to a short of a length ball flies over the keeper
no room again, and the length is a touch fuller, tharanga tries to work it square but cannot get it off the pitch
there is some room this time, good length outside off, steered to square third man
third man is up, Mahela has width outside off, and he happily guides it past the man
swats this from outside off to deep midwicket
he's sweeping well, gets another one off the pad down to fine leg
charges out, is done in the flight, but gets some bat on it as it starts to spin away, rolls to short third
pushed to the bowler
stops, tosses it up slowly, Tharanga comes out but is not to the pitch and takes it on the pad
he can reach this one, it is pitched up, but spinning away, Tharanga picks it from outside off and lofts it over mid on
comes out again, Ashwin pushes it quicker, Tharanga slogs it back, hurries into his crease as Ashwin throws it to the keeper down the leg side
a slow short of a length ball, but Mahela's swung it effortlessly over square leg
century for Mahela with a shuffle and nudge behind square leg, he's had to open in Dilshan's absence, and how well has he batted on a slow surface
short outside off, he opens the face and guides it in the air to third man
makes room outside leg, Ishant gets it around the blockhole for once, Mahela digs it back
he tries the pick-up over square leg from outside off, mistimes it in the air, but well in front of short fine
dropped, another one, Tharanga sliced this over point, Umesh, the sweeper, had it covered as he came in, crouched forward, got both hands to it but it popped out as he fell to the ground
Mahela was ready for a big reverse sweep even before Ashwin had bowled, and he sent it way down the leg side, Mahela pulled out of the stroke, but he's not getting the wide call
pushes it down the leg side
worked to square leg off the pad
lovely, down the track, inside the line and lofts this tossed up ball from way outside leg stump over wide long off
this time Umesh holds on with a run and dive to his right at short third man, Mahela falls to the reverse sweep, hit to a flatter delivery from outside leg stump
flighted ball spins down leg as Angelo misses the nudge
pushes a tossed up ball to the bowler
full again, he runs it towards point for a single
hits a full delivery down to long off
good length ball right on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
straight on a length and down the leg side
bad bounce for extra cover means this push goes past him, could have smacked into his face
sharp diving stop by Jadeja at point, he had a lot of ground to make and the punch was well-timed by Angleo
Tharanga gets a length ball on the pads and clips it square to move to 99

overpitched ball worked through midwicket, and this is a hard-fought century for Tharanga on his comeback, he played-and-missed, inside-edged and outside-edged, but grew in confidence to time them through point
hoicked in the air but short of deep midwicket
length ball punched down to long on
works a quick one to short fine leg
slapped to the sweeper for one
overpitched, and he's gone with the spin over midwicket and picked the gap this time, beating the man in the deep
moves outside off and keeps strike with a tuck to midwicket
towards the pads again, hit to mid on, Ishant's throw misses at the non-striker's
swings a pitched up ball through midwicket, fielder in the deep gets around to it
ducks under a 136.1 kph bouncer around leg stump
mows this slower length ball from outside off to the wide long on boundary
now through the covers, opens the face even as he drives hard, past the dive from cover
sends this straight down the leg from over the stumps
poor line continues, down the pads and flicked past short fine leg
down the leg side from round the stumps, worked square
angled in full down the leg side, nudged behind square
misses the reverse sweep to one that goes down the leg side, not getting a wide
lets this quick one go down leg and this will be called a wide
comes down the track to a flighted ball, misses, and is hit on the pad
spinning down the leg side, worked to deep square

stops and tosses it up very slowly, Tharanga waits and smashes it through midwicket, deep midwicket runs across and dives in front of long on running to his left, but ends up parrying the ball to the boundary
uses the angle to mow a slog-sweep from middle stump over deep midwicket
comes out and pushes back to the bowler
slices in the air, Rohit at short third runs forward for the catch, dives, but it still falls short
flat and spinning down the pads, swung behind square leg
amid all the hitting, this one is defended off the front foot
Tharanga skips out and lofts over midwicket once more, he is not to the pitch and takes a hand off the bat, but it still goes all the way
goes back and cuts this length ball off leg stump, picks up four past cover-point
nudges a tossed up ball off the pad to square leg
goes back to a skiddy length ball on off and cuts to point
nudges in front of midwicket and takes off for a well-judged single
misses the sweep to a tossed up ball on the pad
wristily nudges a full ball off middle to square leg
turns a full ball from off stump to long on
slogs a length ball on middle and leg to midwicket
swats an overpitched ball to long on
DK gets bad bounce as this length ball goes down the leg side but he does well to dive and stop it
misses the slog to a slow offcutter outside off, this time DK falls as he takes it on the bounce
a low full toss, Angelo has wristed this powerfully from middle stump, long on does not have too much ground to make to his right, but it races past him, just past his outstretched right hand
direct hit needed, Tharanga would have been gone by miles, but Kohli misses from midwicket
charges out, gets too close to the pitch and swats it down to long off
gets a wide yorker in outside off, Tharanga can't connect
a low full toss lofted over midwicket
a length ball on off, Tharanga goes over midwicket once more, he's targetted that area, too much to do for long on
moves across and turns a low full toss from outside off to long on to bring up the 300
he continues to hammer boundaries to deep midwicket, a short ball this time, pulled in the air dismissively
widish length ball but he's steered straight to point
a slower short of a length ball slogged to deep midwicket
another slower one from back of a length, a steer, and a misfield at backward point, amid all that, Tharanga purrs to his 150
overpitched now, hit hard but he finds the sweeper
a full toss down the pads, Angelo makes some room, gets front leg away and clips it to the deep midwicket rope
another full toss, they just can't hit the yorkers, and Tharanga's sliced it over point, smack into the rope, wow
good length, slashed down to third man
it gets worse by the minute, Umesh's sprayed this length ball four miles down the leg side, it even pitched outside the wide marker
short of a length into Angelo as he goes outside leg, worked behind square
he's smokin' em through point, a length ball not that far outside off, Tharanga brought a brutal bat down on it, and third man had no chance
a slower length ball on off, he makes some room and guides it wide of short third man
overpitched, just outside off, Angelo clears front leg and carts it over extra cover, India's death bowling lying slaughtered at Sabina Park
another full toss, just outside off, sliced behind point for two more
length ball on leg stump, knocked down to long on
full toss on middle and off, Angelo swings it on the bounce to long on, is disappointed
dear me, a high full toss just outside off, Tharanga's helped himself to maximum over wide long off, outrageous timing
full toss, one more full toss, punched to long off
swung through midwicket for a couple, third umpire called in as Tharanga comes back for the second, he's just made it, as Shami has taken some time to get the bails off

inn2.comm: length ball swings in to the right-hander, who waits in the crease and runs it to point
takes off from just short of a length, Rohit drops it down behind point
swings across full, and is pushed firmly to extra cover, pops out of his hands, but no run conceded
leans forward and defends another away swinger to cover
lets this one go across him from a good length
length on the pads, tucked square for one
bowled fullish, around middle and leg, defended
back of a length, on middle, punched back
tight stuff, good length angled across to off, defended to point
pitched up outside off, left alone with the angle
another leave outside off stump, Mathews settling quickly on a tight line
ends the over with another gentle length ball outside off, left alone again
uppish thick edge on the attempted drive down to third man
pitched outside leg and rolls fine off the pads
defends a good length ball outside off
comes forward and drives off the toe end to point
eases forward and drives past extra cover's dive for a couple
opens the face and runs a length ball to point, kept a tad low
punches this bouncing length ball on the up through the covers
angled in to off on a good length, blocked
drives to point off the front foot
plays out a length ball on middle to midwicket
works this length ball off middle to square leg
shot, a normal length ball from Mathews close to off, but Dhawan's drilled it on the up through cover
its not bouncing as much from Kula as Rohit is expecting, he crouches again to keep out this inswinging length ball

wow, talk about coming in the way of a screamer, Mathews is at short midwicket, Rohit's decided to have a go at this length ball, it's hit the inner part of the bat, but has still come blazing, straight into Mathews' hands, and remained there
moves forward, eases it wide of mid off and is away
works a length ball off the pad to midwicket
aborted appeal for lbw, that length ball pitched outside leg, and also came off the inside edge
cannot beat forward square leg with a tuck off the pads
takes a step forward and defends a length ball on off to short extra cover
closes the face and works it from off stump to fine leg
comes down the track and slashes the length ball, finds point
reaches forward to a length ball, mistimes the push in the air to extra cover
a slower one pitched up, 103.7 kph, driven wide of mid off
comes forward to defend to short extra cover
not that short, but Dhawan's ready to pull in front of square
takes on mid off with a push to a full delivery, throw misses, Dhawan was in anyway
now Vijay's turn to take on mid off, throw off target once more, Vijay would have made it if it had hit
length ball pushed to extra cover
gets width and cracks it in the large gap between extra cover and mid off
wide again, this time, Dhawan mishits the drive into the pitch
defends a good length ball on off half forward
no pace to work with, he turns a gentle length ball to midwicket
punched for short extra cover to make a diving stop
widish length ball thumped straight to short cover
offcutter comes in, Vijay plays it out to leg
back of a length, comes off slowly, Vijay knocks it to midwicket
skips out but finds short extra cover with the push
comes out again, takes it on the full, but cannot beat point
this took off, back of a length, Dhawan was setting himself up but pulled out in the end
just no pace or much room to do anything, knocks it to short extra cover
a diving stop now, Dhawan guided a low full toss but point kept them to the single
crouches to push this incoming length ball to mid on
tossed up full, worked to deep midwicket
works a flighted ball with the turn to long on
tossed up ball pushed off the front foot to extra cover
this skidded on towards off and middle, punched to extra cover
sees him coming and shortens the length, Dhawan guides it to backward point
leaves the crease again, but ends up blocking the flighted ball
pushes forward to a tossed up ball and defends it
the one that skids in, Vijay is hit on the pad, but it was going down leg
pushed down to long off
flighted slowly on middle and leg, nudged square
another one comes in with the angle, he goes back and is hit on the pad again, headed down leg
a thick inside edge onto pad this time as he pushes forward to a flighted  ball
hurries on from a full length on off, thick inside edge square to leg
spins in down leg from a good length
pushes away from the body to a full delivery and helps it past the bowler to long off
follows the spin outside off and guides it to point
slowly comes off a length, and is worked through midwicket off the back foot
pushes a tossed up ball off the inner part of the bat, in the air but short of the bowler
a full toss pushed along the ground to long off
down the track, and lofts over extra cover for a couple
full delivery driven to long off
comes out, takes the carrom ball on the full and pushes to long off
full ball slides in, hits the inner part of the bat and goes to long on
worked off the pad to deep square
charges out and hits down the pitch, bowler gets a hand to it and takes all the pace off it
sweeps a flighted ball off middle to fine leg
paddles a full ball from off stump, and it will beat deep square leg
opens up to a straighter one and works it to square leg
flows out, inside the line, gets to the pitch and lofts crisply over extra cover
looks to work to leg, gets a leading edge to short extra
moves forward neatly again and drives down to long off

huge appeal for lbw first, then a catch at slip, Mahela takes the ball at slip, and towards the end of the appeal, shows the ball to the umpire, Ian Gould keeps shaking his head, Vijay hit on the pad on the forward push, tracker shows it was going down leg
down the track and lofts over the bowler
Dhawan's found deep midwicket, he's charged out targetting the region like Tharanga did, but on the first attempt, has picked the fielder
goes across to block a length ball on middle
reaches outside off and pushes to point for a single
slides in to leg, Vijay shuffles across and works it square
backs away to leg, this is a slow offcutter, he cannot beat point with the cut
wants to hook from well outside off, misses as it bounces steeply
steers to third man off the front foot
opens the face and takes the single to third man
big wicket, big wicket, Mathews digs it short into the body, Kohli hooks, and it is Malinga who takes it low on the fine-leg boundary, Kohli bangs bat into the ground as he departs
walks out right away, it is short again from Angelo, and it pops up in before point as DK fends
presses forward to push to short extra cover
skids in and hits the pads down the leg side
a thick inside edge pops up to vacant short leg as he pushes forward to one that slides in
drives to the bowler off the front foot
nudged to square leg, the throw is fired in and DK has to come back
pushes a length ball to sweeper cover for a single
this hardly got up, DK was expecting the short ball to go over, ducked right into it, Sri Lanka even appealed for lbw, it kept that low
hello, suddenly the pitch is playing tricks, this offcutter reared up at Vijay from well outside off stump, hit the glove as he fended at it
drives a length ball to covers
takes pace off the pitched ball, Vijay has to check the push to midwicket
bowled full on the pads, turned to fine leg
slight inward movement on the length ball, which is turned wide of deep midwicket
right through him, some more of that inswing, very late, fuller length, Vijay drives from the crease, no foot movement at all, and leg stump is rattled through the gate
full to Raina as well first ball and he leans out to work it to midwicket
whips a full toss and times it well enough to beat fine leg to his left
drives awkwardly, in the air, but it does not carry to extra cover
Raina gets the bouncer, moves outside the line and hooks it to fine leg
defends a back of a length ball to point
waits on the length ball and smacks the cut, point's dive takes pace off the stroke, fielding another area of difference between the two sides today
bouncer rises sharply, DK bends knee, pulls head out of the way and drops the wrists
another bouncer, and DK drops the wrists again
this length ball didn't get up, DK pushed away from the body too, and almost played on, escaped with one to fine leg
shapes in a tad and goes down the leg side, Sanga cannot get to it
right on off stump, some inswing again, DK right forward to block
plays out a good length ball to short midwicket
another one on a good length, on off stump, defended
sees the fuller length and goes after it but the late inswing takes the ball to short midwicket off the inner part of the bat
low full toss moving into the pads, away to fine leg
widish good length ball driven off the front foot and into the deep cover boundary
beats the outside edge first ball with a flighted ball outside off
spins in and is pulled to deep midwicket from off
length ball punched off the back foot to extra cover
pushes forward, gets a thick edge past slip
leans forward and clips a tossed up ball past midwicket
straighter one pushed to extra cover
swings in full and is clipped in the air, Mahela goes flying to his right at forward square leg to stop it
full around off, DK does not commit forward, it swings in, and he digs it out
and a short ball on off now, DK weaves inside the line
full outside off, he goes for the extra cover drive, but the movement takes the ball to mid off
short ball, but this time DK cracks a pull in front of square, it is superbly timed, but a slide in the deep saves the boundary
length ball, he pushes off the front foot to mid off
comes down the track, is not to the pitch and pushes it back
drives an overpitched ball, it pops out of extra cover's hands
makes room to one on off and punches to cover
tossed up, drifts in, and is driven back, bowler dives to stop it
moves across and tucks behind square leg off the pad
bat in front of pad to push to the bowler
moves forward and drives a length ball to the sweeper
whacks a full inswinger to mid on, didn't time it
low full toss towards the pad and whipped to the deep midwicket rope
another low full toss, another whip, to forward square leg this time
goes hard at a full delivery but hits it straight to mid on
just not timing the drives with the inswing Malinga is getting, this goes to short extra cover
almost in trouble with a tossed up ball, moves out, pushes, it hits the underedge, rolls to the keeper, who takes the bails off, but Raina's got the bat in by that time
misses the sweep to one down the leg side, Sanga misses the take
tossed up straighter one, he reaches out and pushes, thick inside edge to midwicket
full ball hit to long on
punches down to long on
waits in the crease and cuts a length delivery past point,
defends a length ball straightening on off
comes forward and defends
fired down the pads, and DK helps it on its way with a paddle to fine leg
sweeps to deep backward square
paddles from outside off to fine leg
carrom ball tucked square off middle and leg
skips out, gets too close to the pitch of a quicker one, and knocks it back
goes back to a tossed up length ball, steers and beats short third man's dive
drives a fuller flighted one to long off
hits an overpitched ball down to long on
that looks straight, umpire Wilson says no and signals leg bye, tossed up, drifts in, hits him in front of middle, and tracker says that is taking out leg, Raina lucky to be out there
worked to backward square leg with the spin
this time he is able to defend as he pushes forward
DK goes, charges out, it is a tossed up carrom ball, goes straight, DK slogs outside the line, misses, and Sanga does the rest
comes forward and blocks a length ball angled across
knocks a fuller one to the bowler
clips a full delivery past midwicket to wide long on
pushed through quick outside off, defended off the backfoot
hit on the pad outside leg as he misses the sweep
they are diving all the time, point saves runs now to his right after a steer
good length ball eased to cover
reaches out and pushes a pitched up ball to short cover
pushes a fuller one back to the bowler
whips an overpitched ball in front of square leg and beats the man in the deep
mistimes a pulls off a short ball into the ground at square leg
carrom ball darts across and is dabbed to cover
full and down the leg side, Jadeja misses, Sanga has the bails off quickly, but Jaeja's back foot was always grounded
on off stump, pushed back
good length ball turned to midwicket
worked to deep square leg off the pad
sweeps to short fine leg
whips a short of driving length ball to midwicket
pushes a pitched up ball down to long on
stays low, is nudged in front of square leg
good length, he turns it off the pad to deep square leg
makes some room and slices a full toss to third man
pushes a full one into the pitch, it bounces towards cover, and Jadeja has to get back
comes down and controls the lofted shot on the bounce to deep midwicket
full delivery nudged behind square leg
makes room, leans forward and drills a tossed up ball from leg stump through extra cover
straightens on off, he chops it towards point
moves out and pushes a full delivery to long on
opens the face and steers a slowish length ball to third man
slower one on middle and off, he can't run it past point
back of a length, punched away, midwicket dives and saves the single
bounces from a good length on the pads, is worked to deep square

this is a tight one for the third umpire, they took the single with a nudge behind square leg, there was an overthrow, they went for another run, Raina had to rush back, Mathews took the bails off, Raina put in the dive, which should have seen him home, but the momentum when he crashed into the ground made the bat rise in the air
hooks the bouncer to deep square leg
gets forward to defend a length ball
whips a fuller one to long on
pops up through vacant short leg as he goes forward to block
this takes off and spins past the forward push, hits him on the shoulder
goes back and steers to short third man
comes down the track and pushes in the air just past silly point, who dives, but in vain
presses forward to defend a tossed up ball
moves outside off and works with the spin to deep square leg
pushed in the air off the front foot on the off side
drifts in full to the pads, nudged square
forward to nudge a full delivery from outside off to midwicket
dabs to short third man but is not getting the single
it's on Jadeja's toes and he knew it, he dug it out towards deep midwicket for a single
fuller delivery on off stump, swinging in a touch, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
and another yorker, aimed straight at the toe. Ashwin just manages to get some bat on it as he plays that towards the leg side
a full delivery outside off, Jadeja steers it down to third man
and again, full, just outside off. Ashwin blocks it out to cover and takes a single
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and guides it down to third man
tossed up delivery outside off, Jadeja comes forward and defends
fuller this time, allows the batsman to drive it to deep midwicket
loopy delivery outside off, now Ashwin defends it off the front foot

he tries to reverse sweep a delivery that was around off and middle, but he had gone a little too much to the off side. He gets a healthy top edge that settles in the lap of Malinga at short third man
he had no clue about this one! A quicker delivery, straight and aimed towards middle and leg, Shami went back to work it to the leg side, misses it and loses his leg stump
almost! Tossed up delivery outside off, drew the batsman forward and then went straight past the outside edge
he fires in a yorker outside off from over the wicket, Jadeja blocks it out to point
he bowls a slower bouncer this time, Jadeja arches back and steers it to third man
he knew it was coming, a good yorker this time. Ishant blocks it out to the leg side
this time, Malinga pulls the length back, but keeps it straight. Ishant defends it back to the bowler
he bowls a slow floater outside off, the batsman bends his knees and guides it to third man
short of length delivery, the batsman hops and dabs it down to third man for a single
almost yorks himself with this tossed up ball, inside edge to pad
lunges forward to defend one just outside off
hits a tossed up ball down to long on
goes back to push a length ball to the bowler
drives wide of mid off for a single
nudges off the front foot to square leg and keeps the strike
charges out, reaches the pitch of a flighted ball and lofts cleanly over long on
whipped to deep square leg

sharp turn for Herath, sharp catch from Sanga, it was angled in, Ishant pushed at it, the ball jagged away after pitching, took a healthy edge, but Sanga was alert enough to snap it up, moving to his left
hits the pads with a 81.1 kph delivery, and rolls behind square
backs away to leg, bends the knee and slams a full one to long off
somehow survives the carrom ball that kicks in, he gets bat down just in time
stabs a full and wide one towards point
drills a full one through extra cover, mid off runs around and dives over it
swats a low full toss towards the bowler, it ricochets off his hands towards midwicket, Jadeja does not takes the single
forced to extra cover
overpitched one slammed in the air to long off and he takes the single now
targets the stumps with a pitched up ball, but Umesh gets bat in front of pad
weaves inside the line of a short of a length ball outside off, on the bounce to Sanga to give him some late trouble
hops and turns a back of a length ball to square leg
turns a low full toss to deep square leg
down the pads, and Jadeja happily helps himself to four cheap runs with a nudge
opens the face and runs a full toss to deep point, takes the single, Malinga has one ball at Umesh
a high full toss on middle, pushed to mid off
slanted too wide across the left-hander
slogs a low full toss from outside off to square leg
lets a full and wide one go
reaches forward and swats a full toss to midwicket
gets it away this time, shuffles across, picks another full toss from outside off and lofts it over midwicket
jumps out and hammers a length ball straight back at the bowler, who gets out of the way
almost ended it, almost, moved across and inside-edged a length ball just past his stumps
good length on leg, pushed back to the bowler
lofts a full delivery over the bowler and gets back for the second
banged in very short around off, Jadeja tries to reach it, misses
driven through extra cover, does not take the single
that will do it, Malinga whizzes an inswinging length ball past the half-forward defensive push and rattles the stumps one last time today
